snippet: A new analysis of what a team of astronomers said was evidence of an Earth-mass planet orbiting Alpha Centauri B raises existential questions.
abstract: Analysis published in Astrophysical Journal of data that was released in 2011 by European astronomers casts doubt on their claims of discovery of planet with mass comparable to Earth's orbiting Alpha Centauri B; scientists had posited that other planets in vicinity may have favorable conditions for life, but analysis indicates planet's existence cannot be confirmed.
lead_paragraph: A new analysis of what a team of astronomers said was evidence of an Earth-mass planet orbiting Alpha Centauri B raises existential questions.

headline.seo: Scientists Cast Doubt on the Closest Exoplanet
headline.main: Hold Off on the Alpha Centauri Trip
headline.print_headline: Hold Off on the Alpha Centauri Trip
